attributes.review: The app gave my phone a 🦠 upon opening called fake news 🤷🏽‍♀️also it wanted a lot of private information but I keep my stuff on🔒still don’t understand why a whole president would need an app🧐but anyway there weren’t any games🙄just a crazy amount of pictures of this Cheeto🤡also it kept wanting me to donate but I keep my💰closed🤪get this app off the AppStore and remember Tabitha Brown2020✌🏽
attributes.title: Absolutely wouldn’t recommend

attributes.review: I was trying to open this app but it kept crashing immediately as I opened it. I was at work trying to access the app on my short break and it took an entire 30 minutes to finally boot up. My hands were so sweaty from holding my phone for so long that when I went back into the kitchen i dropped my phone In the fryer! This app is the reason why I plagued every costumer in my restaurant .
attributes.title: Crashing

attributes.review: I open the app and the first thing they ask was what ethnicity I am and all the options were white and other forms of white ethnicities and when I put other they logged me out of the app and deleted itself off my phone then texted me to kick rocks. Ever since that has happen I keep getting notifications from the app but I don’t have it anymore so I don’t know why it keeps sending me them
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: I first downloaded the app in hopes of making my country great again when I was then greeted by a half orange half Cheeto hybrid it was traumatizing furthermore when my siblings saw this app one of them died and the others went into anaphylactic shock we now have major hospital bills because of it second of all this app was so laggy and such bad quality like come on man I just came to have fun and now I’m stuck in the hospital
attributes.title: Absolute trash

attributes.review: I opened the app and it was very glitchy!! So I got out of the app and a bunch of Cheeto puffs were my lock screen 😭😭 so I tried to change my lock screen and my camera roll was all Cheeto puffs! I tried opening other apps and all I could see were Cheeto puffs 😞 and you’ll never guess what happened next... MY PHONE TURNED INTO A CHEETO PUFF 😭😭😭😭 I had to type this review on the Cheeto puff galaxy 3000.. if you don’t want your phone to turn into a Cheeto puff.. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 🥰🥰
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: i can’t even explain how horrible this app is!!! First things first, THIS APP MADE MY PHONE SUPER GLITCHY!😡 i was so excited to download this because of my orange god🍊😬 but it took sooo long to download and i 100% agree with all these hate reviews💯‼️ AND i kept on getting emails from donald trumpas and he wanted to take me to the white house because he had some “plans” to do with me... i am a minor and i am super disgusted and disappointed in donald trumpas!!☹️ HOW COULD YOU ORANGE MAN🤢😭😤🍊🍊🍊
attributes.title: how could you orange man😭

attributes.review: first of all, horrible app. not to sound like a karen, but honestly, I need to see the manager of this app. you would think the president has a great app, but right after the 5 hour download, my home was infested with mice. I’ve never had experience with vermin until downloading this app. after the mice incident, my family got tested for COVID-19. WE ALL HAD IT. idk if this is a setup, but this app is the worst app in the App Store and deserves to be taken down.
attributes.title: disgusting

attributes.review: I was super excited to get this app up and going, until that same night when I tried to have coitus with my girl. It was right then and there where the universe came to me and explained how my virginity had returned and that technically I was no longer a NON-VIRGIN. It had come back to me and my girl immediately left knowing that I had not had my first time once again. So this is by far the WORST app I’ve ever downloaded...
attributes.title: My virginity came back

attributes.review: Ok so first off, the app keeps showing the face of a disgusting orange although I don’t know who that person is. Second, this app is giving me severe diarrhea and vomiting issues. Third, I have arachnophobia (fear of spiders) and this app has made me even more afraid than I already was of spiders. Fourth, I have experienced MULTIPLE glitches in its algorithm and it is super annoying. Finally fifth, the app tried to shoot nerf bullets at me and they hurt.😫
attributes.title: I hate this app with all my gut. Periodt.
